is TCF_NFTPrice {\r\n    // Mapping from token ID to account to mint time array\r\n    // \u7528\u6237\u62e5\u6709\u7684id,mapping(owner => mapping(tokenId => uint256[]))\r\n    mapping(address => mapping(uint256 => uint256[])) private _ownedTokenIds;\r\n    // \u7528\u6237nft\u7684\u521b\u5efa\u65f6\u95f4\uff0cmapping(tokenId => mapping(owner => mapping(editionId => mintTime)))\r\n    // mintTime == 0 \u8868\u793a\u8be5NFT\u5df2\u7ecf\u88ab\u8f6c\u79fb\r\n    mapping(uint256 => mapping(address => mapping(uint256 => uint256)))\r\n        private _mintTimes;\r\n\r\n    // test _mintTimes\r\n    function test_MintTimes(\r\n        uint256 tokenId,\r\n        address account,\r\n        uint256 editionId\r\n    ) public view returns (uint256) {\r\n        require(tokenId < 6, E.ERR_TOKENID_RANGE);\r\n        return _mintTimes[tokenId][account][editionId];\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // test _ownedTokenIds\r\n    function test_OwnedTokenIds(\r\n        address account,\r\n        uint256 tokenId\r\n    ) public view returns (uint256[] memory) {\r\n        return _ownedTokenIds[account][tokenId];\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // \u8986\u5199_safeTransferFrom\u51fd\u6570\uff0c\u6dfb\u52a0\u5bf9mintTimes\u7684\u5904\u7406\r\n    function _safeTransferFrom(\r\n        address from,\r\n        address to,\r\n        uint256 tokenId,\r\n        uint256[] calldata indexes,\r\n        bytes memory data\r\n    ) internal virtual override(TCF_ERC1155) {\r\n        // \u9632\u6b62\u540e\u9762\u4ee3\u7801\u53d1\u751f\u9519\u8bef\uff0c\u88abrevert\u4e0d\u53ef\u9884\u671f\u7684\u9519\u8bef\r\n        require(to != address(0), \"ERC1155: transfer to the zero address\");\r\n        require(tokenId < 6, E.ERR_TOKENID_RANGE);\r\n\r\n        // \u5904\u7406mintTimes and _ownedTokenIds\r\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < indexes.length; i++) {\r\n            // \u68c0\u67e5\u662f\u5426\u8fc7\u671f\uff0c\u8fc7\u671f\u4e4b\u540e\u624d\u53ef\u4ee5\u8f6c\r\n            uint256 index = indexes[i];\r\n            uint256 mintTime =        E.ERR_TOKEN_NOT_OWNED\r\n            );\r\n\r\n            require(\r\n                block.timestamp > mintTime + indate,\r\n                E.ERR_NFT_SENDED_VALID\r\n            );\r\n\r\n            // \u5c06mintTime\u53d8\u4e3a0\uff0c\u8868\u793a\u8f6c\u79fb\r\n            _mintTimes[tokenId][to][index] = 0;\r\n            // \u4ece_ownedTokenIds\u4e2d\u79fb\u9664index\r\n            uint256[] storage fromOwnedTokenIds = _ownedTokenIds[from][tokenId];\r\n            uint256[] storage toOwnedTokenIds = _ownedTokenIds[to][tokenId];\r\n            // \u67e5\u627eindex\u5728fromOwnedTokenIds\u4e2d\u7684\u4f4d\u7f6e\u5e76\u79fb\u9664\r\n            for (uint256 j = 0; j < fromOwnedTokenIds.length; j++) {\r\n                if (fromOwnedTokenIds[j] == index) {\r\n                    // \u79fb\u9664\u5143\u7d20\r\n                    fromOwnedTokenIds[j] = fromOwnedTokenIds[\r\n                        fromOwnedTokenIds.length - 1\r\n     toOwnedTokenIds.push(index);\r\n            // \u6e05\u9664from\u7684mintTime\r\n            _mintTimes[tokenId][from][index] = 0;\r\n        }\r\n        super._safeTransferFrom(from, to, id,\r\n        uint256 amount,\r\n        bytes memory data\r\n    ) internal virtual override(TCF_ERC1155) {\r\n        uint256 currentTime = block.timestamp;\r\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < prices\r\n    ) public view returns (string memory) {\r\n        // 1\u3001\u68c0\u67e5tokenAddresses\u548cprices[i].priceData.length\u76f8\u540c\r\n        // 2\u3001\u4ef7\u683c\u91cc\u9762\u5fc5\u987b\u652f\u6301\u539f\u751f\u4ee3\u5e01\r\n        // 3\u3001\u68c0\u67e5\u4ef7\u683c\u53c2\u6570\u4e2d\u6bcf\u4e2aNFT\u652f\u6301\u7684token Address \u662f\u5426\u5728\u6240\u652f\u6301\u7684tokenAddress\u5217\u8868\u4e4b\u5185\r\n\r\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < 6; ++i) {\r\n            // \u8ba1\u5212\u652f\u63013\u79cd\u4ee3\u5e01\uff0c\u5305\u62ecUSDT,TC,DCF\r\n            // 1\u3001\u4e0d\u5f3a\u5236\u8981\u6c42tokenAddresses\u957f\u5ea6\u4e3a2\u7684\u539f\u56e0\uff1a\u9879\u76ee\u53ef\u80fd\u6682\u65f6\u4e0d\u652f\u6301USDT\u3002\u4e3a\u4ec0\u4e48\u662f2\uff0c\u56e0\u4e3aTC\u662f\u539f\u751f\u4ee3\u5e01\uff0c\u6240\u4ee5\u4e0d\u9700\u8981\u4f20\u5165\u5730\u5740\r\n            if (prices[i].length != supportedTokenAmount) {\r\n                return E.ERR_PRICES_LEN;\r\n            }\r\n\r\n            // \u8981\u6c42\u652f\u4ed8\u65b9\u5f0f\u4e3a\u652f\u6301\u7684\u4ee3\u5e01\u7c7b\u578b\r\n            // \u8981\u6c42\u4ef7\u683c\u91cc\u9762\u5fc5\u987b\u652f\u6301\u539f\u751f\u4ee3\u5e01\r\n            priceTypeAndAomut[] memory price = prices[i];\r\n            // bool TCExist = false;\r\n            for (uint256 j = 0; j < supportedTokenAmount; ++j) {\r\n                // \u83b7\u53d6\u8d2d\u4e70\u67d0\u4e2aNFT\u65f6\uff0c\u652f\u6301\u7684\u67d0\u79cd\u652f\u4ed8\u65b9\u5f0f\u7684\u5408\u7ea6\u5730\u5740\r\n                if (\r\n                    price[j].tokenAddress != address(0) &&\r\n                    // \u5728initSupportToken\u4e2d\u5df2\u7ecf\u8bbe\u7f6e\r\n                    supportTokenType[price[j].tokenAddress] != 1\r\n                ) {\r\n                    return\r\n                        _detailAddr(\r\n                            price[j].tokenAddress,\r\n                            E.ERR_TOKEN_UNSUPPORTED\r\n                        );\r\n                }\r\n\r\n                // \u4ee3\u7801\u91cf\u8fc7\u5927\uff0c\u5220\u9664\u4e00\u4e9b\u4e0d\u5fc5\u8981\u7684\u68c0\u67e5\r\n                // if (tokenAddress == address(0)) {\r\n                //     if (TCExist == true) {\r\n                //         return\r\n                //             \"Only one zero address representing TC is allowed\";\r\n                //     } else {\r\n                //         TCExist = true;\r\n                //     }\r\n                // }\r\n            }\r\n\r\n            // if (!TCExist) {\r\n            //     return \"One zero address representing TC must exist\";\r\n            // }\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        return \"\";\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u5220\u9664\u67d0\u4e2a\u652f\u6301\u7684\u4ee3\u5e01\u5730\u5740\uff08\u4e0d\u5141\u8bb8\u5220\u9664\u539f\u751f\u4ee3\u5e01\uff09\u3002\r\n     * @param oldTokenAddress \u8981\u5220\u9664\u7684\u4ee3\u5e01\u5408\u7ea6\u5730\u5740\r\n     */\r\n    function deleteSupportedToken(address oldTokenAddress) external onlyOwner {\r\n        // \u539f\u751f\u4ee3\u5e01\u4e0d\u80fd\u88ab\u5220\u9664\r\n        require(oldTokenAddress != address(0), E.ERR_NATURE_TOKEN_DEL);\r\n        // \u68c0\u67e5\u5c31tokenAddress\u662f\u5426\u88ab\u521d\u59cb\u5316\u8fc7\r\n        require(\r\n            supportTokenType[oldTokenAddress] == 1,\r\n            _detailAddr(oldTokenAddress, E.ERR_TOKEN_UNSUPPORTED)\r\n        );\r\n\r\n        // \u5220\u9664map\u5217\u8868\u4e2d\u8981\u5220\u9664\u7684\u5730\u5740\r\n        delete supportTokenType[oldTokenAddress];\r\n        // supportedTokenAmount\u5305\u542b\u539f\u751f\u4ee3\u5e01\u6570\uff0c\u4f46\u539f\u751ftoken\u6ca1\u6709\u5730\u5740\uff0c\u6240\u4ee5tokenAddress_array\u5143\u7d20\u6570=supportedTokenAmount-1\r\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < supportedTokenAmount - 1; i++) {\r\n            if (tokenAddress_array[i] == oldTokenAddress) {\r\n                // supportedTokenAmount\u5305\u542b\u539f\u751f\u4ee3\u5e01\u6570\uff0c\u4f46\u539f\u751f\u4ee3\u5e01\u5730\u5740\u4e3a\u7a7a\uff0c\u4e0d\u4fdd\u5b58\uff0c\u6240\u4ee5\u51cf2\r\n                // \u5c06\u6700\u540e\u4e00\u4e2a\u5143\u7d20\u653e\u7f6e\u5728\u5220\u9664\u7684\u4f4d\u7f6e\r\n                tokenAddress_array[i] = tokenAddress_array[\r\n                    supportedTokenAmount - 2\r\n                ];\r\n                // \u5220\u9664\u6700\u540e\u4e00\u4e2a\u5143\u7d20\r\n                // \u5fc5\u987b\u4f7f\u7528pop\u5b8c\u6210\u5220\u9664\u6700\u540e\u4e00\u4e2a\u5143\u7d20\uff0c\u6570\u7ec4\u7684\u6570\u636e\u957f\u5ea6\u51cf\u4e00\r\n                // \u5728\u589e\u52a0\u6570\u636e\u65f6\uff0c\u4f7f\u7528push\uff0c\u5728\u539f\u6570\u636e\u7684\u57fa\u7840\u4e0a\u8fdb\u884c\u589e\u52a0\u3002\r\n                // \u5982\u679c\u8d4b\u503c\u4e3a\u7a7a\uff0c\u5728\u589e\u52a0\u65f6\uff0c\u5c31\u4f1a\u5728\u7a7a\u5730\u5740\u540e\u9762\u589e\u52a0\u65b0\u7684\u5143\u7d20\uff0c\u4e0d\u7b26\u5408\u9884\u671f\r\n                tokenAddress_array.pop();\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n        supportedTokenAmount -= 1;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u6dfb\u52a0\u652f\u6301\u7684\u4ee3\u5e01\u5730\u5740\u5217\u8868\uff08\u539f\u751f\u4ee3\u5e01\u4e0d\u9700\u8981\u4f20\u5165\u5730\u5740\uff09\u3002\u6784\u9020\u51fd\u6570\u4e2d\u5df2\u7ecf\u6dfb\u52a0\u4e86\u539f\u751f\u4ee3\u5e01TC\u3002\r\n     * \u5982\u679c\u9879\u76ee\u53ea\u652f\u6301TC\uff0c\u5219\u4e0d\u9700\u8981\u8c03\u7528\u8fd9\u4e2a\u51fd\u6570\u3002\r\n     * @param tokenAddresses \u4ee3\u5e01\u5408\u7ea6\u5730\u5740\u6570\u7ec4\uff08\u4f8b\u5982DCF\u3001USDT\uff09\r\n     */\r\n    function addSupportedToken(\r\n        address[] memory tokenAddresses\r\n    ) public onlyOwner {\r\n        string memory code = _checkTokenAddressesCode(tokenAddresses);\r\n        if (bytes(code).length != 0) {\r\n            revert(code);\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        uint256 len = tokenAddresses.length;\r\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < len; i++) {\r\n            // \u5982\u679c\u4f20\u51650\u5730\u5740\uff0c\u53c2\u6570\u68c0\u67e5\u65e0\u6cd5\u901a\u8fc7\uff0c\u6240\u4ee5\u8fd9\u91cc\u4e0d\u9700\u8981\u8fdb\u884c\u68c0\u67e5\r\n            // if (tokenAddresses[i] == address(0)) {\r\n            //     // \u539f\u751f\u4ee3\u5e01\u4e0d\u5141\u8bb8\u6dfb\u52a0\r\n            //     supportTokenType[address(0x1)] = 1;\r\n            //     tokenAddress_array.push(address(0x1));\r\n            // } else {}\r\n            supportTokenType[tokenAddresses[i]] = 1;\r\n            tokenAddress_array.push(tokenAddresses[i]);\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        supportedTokenAmount += len;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // \u67e5\u770b\u67d0\u4e2a\u5730\u5740\u662f\u5426\u652f\u6301\r\n    function isSupported(address token) external view returns (uint8) {\r\n        if (token == address(0)) {\r\n            token = address(0x1);\r\n        }\r\n        return supportTokenType[token];\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u5bf9\u65b0\u589e\u7684\u652f\u6301\u4ee3\u5e01\u5730\u5740\u8fdb\u884c\u6821\u9a8c\uff08\u5730\u5740\u6570\u91cf\u3001\u91cd\u590d\u3001\u662f\u5426\u4e3aDCF/USDT\u7b49\uff09\u3002\r\n     * @param _tokenAddresses \u4ee3\u5e01\u5408\u7ea6\u5730\u5740\u6570\u7ec4\r\n     * @return \u9519\u8bef\u7801/\u9519\u8bef\u4fe1\u606f\uff1b\u6210\u529f\u65f6\u4e3a\u7a7a\u5b57\u7b26\u4e32\r\n     */\r\n    function checkTokenAddressesCode(\r\n        address[] memory _tokenAddresses\r\n    ) external view returns (string memory) {\r\n        return _checkTokenAddressesCode(_tokenAddresses);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // \u8bbe\u7f6e\u652f\u6301\u7684token\u65f6\uff0c\u8fdb\u884c\u53c2\u6570\u68c0\u67e5\r\n    function _checkTokenAddressesCode(\r\n        address[] memory tokenAddresses\r\n    ) private view returns (string memory) {\r\n        uint256 len = tokenAddresses.length;\r\n\r\n        // \u68c0\u67e5\u662f\u5426\u4e3aDCF\u6216USDT,\u5728\u68c0\u67e5\u662f\u5426\u5408\u7ea6\u5730\u5740\u4e4b\u540e\r\n        bool DCFExist;\r\n        bool USDTExist;\r\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < len; i++) {\r\n            // \u68c0\u67e5\u5730\u5740\u662f\u5426\u5df2\u7ecf\u5b58\u5728\r\n            if (supportTokenType[tokenAddresses[i]] == 1) {\r\n                return _detailAddr(tokenAddresses[i], E.ERR_ADDR_EXISTS);\r\n            }\r\n\r\n            // \u68c0\u67e5\u662f\u5426\u4e3aDCF\u5408\u7ea6\u548cUSDT\u5408\u7ea6\uff0c\u6ca1\u6709\u7ee7\u7eed\u64cd\u4f5c\u662f\u56e0\u4e3a\uff0c\u5728\u7ee7\u7eed\u4e4b\u524d\u9700\u8981\u68c0\u67e5\u8fd9\u4e24\u4e2a\u5408\u7ea6\u662f\u5426\u4e3aerc20\u5408\u7ea6\r\n            // \u4e0d\u53ef\u4ee5\u901a\u8fc7erc163\u5408\u7ea6\u6765\u5b9e\u73b0\uff08USDT\u6ca1\u6709\u5b9e\u73b0erc163\uff09\uff0c\u76f4\u63a5\u4f7f\u7528call\u8c03\u7528\r\n            bytes memory callData = abi.encodeWithSignature(\"symbol()\");\r\n            // \u5982\u679c\u4f20\u5165EOA\u5730\u5740\uff0c\u4f1a\u8fd4\u56desuccess\uff0c\u4f46\u957f\u5ea6\u4e3a0\r\n            (bool success, bytes memory data) = tokenAddresses[i].staticcall(\r\n                callData\r\n            );\r\n            // \u5982\u679c\u5730\u5740\u548cEOA\u5730\u5740\u8fd4\u56desuccess\uff0c\u4f46data\u957f\u5ea6\u4e3a0\r\n            // \u5730\u5740\u4e3a\u96f6\u4e5f\u4f1a\u8fd4\u56de\u9519\u8bef\u4fe1\u606f\r\n            if (success && data.length > 0) {\r\n                string memory symbol = abi.decode(data, (string));\r\n                // \u5fc5\u987b\u662fDCF\u6216USDT\u5408\u7ea6\r\n                bytes32 symbolHash = keccak256(bytes(symbol));\r\n                if (\r\n                    symbolHash != keccak256(bytes(\"DCF\")) &&\r\n                    symbolHash != keccak256(bytes(\"USDT\"))\r\n                ) {\r\n                    return _detailAddr(tokenAddresses[i], E.ERR_NOT_DCF_USDT);\r\n                } else if (symbolHash == keccak256(bytes(\"DCF\"))) {\r\n                    // \u4e0a\u4e00\u4e2a\u5730\u5740\u662fDCF,\u5e76\u4e14\u8fd9\u4e2a\u5730\u5740\u4e5f\u662fDCF\r\n                    if (DCFExist) {\r\n                        return E.ERR_DUP_DCF;\r\n                    } else {\r\n                        DCFExist = true;\r\n                    }\r\n                } else {\r\n                    // \u4e0a\u4e00\u4e2a\u5730\u5740\u662fUSDT,\u5e76\u4e14\u8fd9\u4e2a\u5730\u5740\u4e5f\u662fUSDT\r\n                    if (USDTExist) {\r\n                        return E.ERR_DUP_USDT;\r\n                    } else {\r\n                        USDTExist = true;\r\n                    }\r\n                }\r\n            } else {\r\n                return _detailAddr(tokenAddresses[i], E.ERR_NOT_DCF_USDT);\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n        return \"\";\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function _toHexString(\r\n        address account\r\n    ) private pure returns (string memory) {\r\n        bytes20 data = bytes20(account);\r\n        bytes16 hexSymbols = 0x30313233343536373839616263646566;\r\n        bytes memory str = new bytes(42);\r\n        str[0] = \"0\";\r\n        str[1] = \"x\";\r\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < 20; i++) {\r\n            uint8 b = uint8(data[i]);\r\n            str[2 + i * 2] = bytes1(hexSymbols[b >> 4]);\r\n            str[3 + i * 2] = bytes1(hexSymbols[b & 0x0f]);\r\n        }\r\n        return string(str);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function _detailAddr(\r\n        address addr,\r\n        string memory code\r\n    ) private pure returns (string memory) {\r\n        return string(abi.encodePacked(code, \" \", _toHexString(addr)));\r\n    }\r\n}\r\n","keccak256":"0x63b97b0dac85dc4e10f0b584c231c76ffe8707b4ebe027dcd11304550332fb4a","license":"MIT"},"project/contracts/extensions/TCF_ErrorCode.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: string internal constant ERR_NOT_DCF_USDT = \"NOT_DCF_USDT\";\r\n    string internal constant ERR_DUP_DCF = \"DUP_DCF\";\r\n    string internal constant ERR_DUP_USDT = \"DUP_USDT\";\r\n    string SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\r\npragma solidity ^0.8.1;\r\n\r\nimport {TCF_ERC1155MintTime} from \"./../ERC1155/TCF_ERC1155MintTime.sol\";\r\n\r\n/// @title BinaryTree\r\n/// @notice \u5730\u5740\u4e8c\u53c9\u6811\uff08\u5e26\u63a8\u8350\u5173\u7cfb\u7ea6\u675f + \u8282\u70b9\u5145\u503c\u4f59\u989d\u7edf\u8ba1\uff09\r\n/// @dev \u8bf4\u660e\uff1a\r\n///  - \u6bcf\u4e2a\u8282\u70b9\u7528\u4e00\u4e2a\u5730\u5740\u8868\u793a\uff0c\u8282\u70b9\u662f\u5426\u5b58\u5728\u7531 mapping \u8bb0\u5f55\u3002\r\n///  - \u63d2\u5165\u8282\u70b9\u65f6\u5fc5\u987b\u6307\u5b9a\u7236\u8282\u70b9\u5730\u5740 + \u63a8\u8350\u4eba\u5730\u5740\u3002\r\n///  - \u82e5 A \u63a8\u8350 B\uff0c\u5219 B \u5fc5\u987b\u63d2\u5165\u5728\u4ee5 A \u4e3a\u6839\u7684\u5b50\u6811\u5206\u53c9\u4e4b\u4e0b\uff08\u5373\uff1aB \u7684\u7236\u8282\u70b9\u5fc5\u987b\u5728 A \u7684\u5b50\u6811\u5185\uff09\u3002\r\n///  - \u6bcf\u4e2a\u8282\u70b9\uff08\u5730\u5740\uff09\u53ef\u5411\u5408\u7ea6\u5145\u503c ETH\uff0c\u5e76\u8bb0\u5165\u8be5\u8282\u70b9\u4f59\u989d\uff08\u5408\u7ea6\u5185\u8d26\u672c\uff09\u3002\r\n\r\n// TODO :\u5220\u9664\u5b58\u6b3e\u529f\u80fd\uff0c\u4e14\u5220\u9664\u76f8\u5173\u53d8\u91cf\u548c\u4e8b\u4ef6\uff0c\u53ea\u4fdd\u7559\u6811\u7ed3\u6784\u548c\u63a8\u8350\u5173\u7cfb\r\n// TODO :\u5728\u8d2d\u4e70NFT\u65f6\uff0c\u68c0\u67e5\u8282\u70b9\u662f\u5426\u5728\u6811\u4e2d\r\n\r\ncontract BinaryTree is TCF_ERC1155MintTime {\r\n    struct Node {\r\n        address parent;\r\n        address left;\r\n        address right;\r\n        address recommender;\r\n        bool exists;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /// @notice \u6839\u8282\u70b9\u5730\u5740\uff08\u521d\u59cb\u5316\u540e\u4e0d\u53ef\u66f4\u6539\uff09\r\n    address public root;\r\n    bool public rootInitialized;\r\n\r\n    mapping(address => Node) private indexed node,\r\n        address indexed parent,\r\n        address indexed recommender,\r\n        bool isLeft\r\n    );\r\n    // ------------------------- Root Init (Requirement #5) -------------------------\r\n    /// @notice \u521d\u59cb\u5316\u6839\u8282\u70b9\uff08\u53ea\u80fd\u6267\u884c\u4e00\u6b21\uff0c\u4e14\u53ea\u80fd\u7531\u5408\u7ea6\u90e8\u7f72\u8005/owner \u8c03\u7528\uff09\r\n    /// @param rootAddress \u6839\u8282\u70b9\u5730\u5740\r\n    function initRoot(address rootAddress) external onlyOwner {\r\n        require(!rootInitialized, \"BinaryTree:
